Case# MKPinAnnotationColor.green

iOS 3.0–9.0DeprecatediPadOS 3.0–9.0DeprecatedMac Catalyst 13.1–13.1DeprecatedmacOS 10.9–10.11Deprecated

```
case green
```

Deprecated

Use MKPinAnnotationView's pinTintColor instead

## [Discussion](/documentation/MapKit/MKPinAnnotationColor/green#Discussion)

The head of the pin is green. Green pins indicate starting points on the map.
